color_scheme.label: Site Color scheme
color_scheme.info: Only for new users who haven't chosen a color scheme or for no-js mode.

colors_text.label: Text
colors_text.info: Used as foreground color on background colors.

colors_background_overlay.label: Overlay
colors_background_overlay.info: Applied in sections with the overlay opacity setting.

type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_header_font_card.label: Heading font
type_header_font_card.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_text_font_card.label: Description font
type_text_font_card.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_subtitle_font.label: Font
type_subtitle_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_button_font.label: Font
type_button_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_header_menu_font.label: Font
type_header_menu_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_footer_menu_font.label: Links font
type_footer_menu_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_popups_heading_font.label: Heading popups font
type_popups_heading_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_popups_text_font.label: Text popup font
type_popups_text_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

notification_heading_scale.label: Medium notification banner font size scale

notification_text_scale.label: Small notification banner font size scale

type_additional_font.label: Additional text font
type_additional_font.info: Used for tags, badges, etc. Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

badge_custom_show.label: Show custom badge
badge_custom_show.info: Need to add a metafield "custom.badges" with type "Single line text" in Shopify admin. [About metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields)

card_color_scheme.label: Product card color scheme
card_color_scheme.info: Product card color scheme not applied in sections that have a "Color scheme" setting.

enable_color_swatch.label: Enable color swatches
enable_color_swatch.info: Color swatches will be shown for the option set in "Swatch trigger". The theme supports values from [category metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/category-metafields/using-category-metafields).

custom_colors.label: Custom colors
custom_colors.info: Colors will be overridden with the values from this field. Each color must be in its own line, like "Red: #ff0000". You can also use CSS Gradient.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

paragraph__intro.content: Settings apply to the product card.

add_to_cart_enabled.label: Enable "Quick Buy" button
add_to_cart_enabled.info: Displayed for products without options or for products with a single option "Color" if Color swatches are enabled in the settings.

show_on_mobile.label: Enable "Quick View" / "Quick Buy" button on mobile devices

predictive_search_enabled.label: Enable predictive search for "Search" and "404" pages

pagination_type.label: Pagination type
pagination_type.info: Pagination type for pages of collections and blogs.

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

enable_cart_drawer.label: Enable cart drawer
enable_cart_drawer.info: Will be enabled on all pages except the cart page.

paragraph_empty.content: If no values are specified, default values will be used on the cart page and in the drawer.

message_shipping.label: Message
message_shipping.default: You're only ||amount|| away from free shipping
message_shipping.info: Use ||amount|| to display progress towards free shipping.

min_spend.label: Minimum spend for free shipping
min_spend.info: In store currency "Store settings → Store details → Shop currency". Currency conversion will be applied for the customer.
min_spend.content: It is recommended to [create a discount for free shipping](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/discounts/discount-types/free-shipping) or [create a free shipping rate](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/fulfillment/setup/shipping-rates/flat-shipping-rates#create-free-shipping-rates) in the store.

message_shipping_free.label: Message for free shipping
message_shipping_free.default: Congratulations! You qualify for free shipping.

save_quick_view.label: Save recently viewed products after quick view

links_blank.label: Open external links in a new tab
links_blank.info: Applies where the "Open this link in a new window" setting is unavailable, e.g., for the Button link field, menu links, and social media links.

show_secondary_image.label: Show second image on hover
show_secondary_image.info: Applies if the global setting "Theme settings → Product card → Enable hover effect" is enabled.

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: To add an underline, select the text and press Ctrl + U for Windows and Linux or Cmd + U for Mac.

aspect_ratio.label: Aspect ratio
aspect_ratio.info: When "Adapt to image" option is selected, the aspect ratio applies to the highest image in the blocks.

show_video.label: Show video
show_video.info: If this setting is enabled and a video is selected, the image will not be displayed.

animate_on_scroll.label: Animate on scroll
animate_on_scroll.info: If this setting is enabled, the animation will be triggered when the section is in view.

columns.label: Grid columns amount
columns.info: The cards will be distributed in this amount of columns. For example, if this setting is set to 2 columns, the card with column start 1 and column end 2 will be placed in the first column of the grid, and the card with column start 2 and column end 3 will be placed in the second column.

row_end.label: Row end
row_end.info: For more examples of the grid, visit [the theme's documentation page](https://apparentcollective.com/help-center/documentation/san-francisco/#grid-banner).

mobile_aspect_ratio.label: Card aspect ratio on mobile devices

description.default: Here can be a short tagline related to this banner.

mock_timer.label: Enable mock timer
mock_timer.info: Simulates a countdown starting from 2 days and 3 hours.

gap.label: Gap
gap.info: Only if the image block added

description.default: Use this space to highlight the details of the countdown, whether it’s the final hours of a sale, the launch of a new collection, or an exclusive pre-order.

image_ratio.label: Aspect ratio
image_ratio.info: Only for the "Overlay" layout. For "Cards" layout, it will be calculated authomatically.

heading.default: This is where your message goes

description.default: Use this space to provide details about what’s being featured in this card, whether it’s a new launch, a trending product, or an exclusive deal.

enable_freemode.label: Enable free mode
enable_freemode.info: Smooth scrolling mode slider. This option only works for mobile devices.

paragraph__1.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

mobile_cards_layout.label: Mobile cards layout
mobile_cards_layout.info: Cards displaying and interraction type on mobile

button_alignment.label: Button alignment
button_alignment.info: Does not work with "Button as cursor" option

use_card_as_link.label: Use card as the link
use_card_as_link.info: If "Card link" option below is empty, the button link will be used for the card link.

card_link.label: Card link
card_link.info: Use this with "Use card as the link" option. If empty, the button link will be used.

button_as_cursor.label: Button as cursor
button_as_cursor.info: Show button as cursor when hovering over image. Use this with "Use card as the link" option.

text.label: Text
text.default: Use this space for a store update or special offer.

include_margins.label: Enable the container used in the theme

slider_text.label: Text
slider_text.default: Add average rating and review count

slide_text.label: Text
slide_text.default: This space is for a testimonial that highlights a great customer experience.

image.label: Image
image.info: Only applicable when the "With image" layout is selected

text.label: Text
text.default: Use this space to explain why this ticker is important, whether it’s about an ongoing sale, a restock alert, or an exclusive deal.

read_all_button_label.label: Read all button label
read_all_button_label.info: Leave empty to use default "Read all" label.

read_article_button_label.label: "Read article" button label
read_article_button_label.info: Leave empty to use default label.

collections_to_show.label: Columns in row
collections_to_show.info: Applicable only for the Columns Layout type.

question.default: Use this space to ask a question

answer.default: Use this space to provide a more informative response, explaining the topic in a way that is easy to understand while covering the key points that customers need to know.

inner_text.label: Inner text
inner_text.default: Use this space to give more details about what’s being shown in the image — this could be product specifications, an event highlight, or an introduction to a collection.

inner_text__1.label: Inner text 1
inner_text__1.default: Use this space to provide more details about what’s featured in this section

inner_text__2.label: Inner text 2
inner_text__2.default: Use this space to provide more details about what’s featured in this section

main_text.label: Text
main_text.default: Use this space for a short company tagline or mission statement.
main_text.info: Text that appears below the logo.

head_alignment.label: Logo, text and social media icons alignment

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__3.info: To add a country/region, go to your [markets settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

header__4.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).

header__5.info: To add payment methods, go to your [payments settings](/admin/settings/payments).

header__7.info: To add store policies, go to your [policy settings](/admin/settings/legal).

subscribe_paragraph.content: When customers subscribe to emails, customer accounts are created. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers)

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: A heading is required to display the menu.

default_open.label: Menu on mobile devices is open by default

logo_2.label: Dark mode logo image
logo_2.info: Recommended uploading a dark mode logo with the same height as the logo image.

secondary_logo_dark.label: Secondary dark logo image
secondary_logo_dark.info: Recommended uploading a dark mode logo with the same height as the logo image.

menu.label: Main menu
menu.info: Main menu is displayed in the header on desktop devices and in the hamburger menu on mobile devices.

search_menu.label: Popular searches menu
search_menu.info: The links of this single-level menu will be displayed below the search input in the modal search.

enable_country_selector.label: Enable country/region selector
enable_country_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [markets settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

enable_language_selector.label: Enable language selector
enable_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).

enable_search.label: Enable search
enable_search.info: If this option is disabled, settings below will not work.

enable_social.label: Enable social media links in mobile menu

mega_menu_trigger.label: Trigger
mega_menu_trigger.info: Write the exact name of the menu link. For more information, visit [the documentation page.](https://apparentcollective.com/help-center/documentation/san-francisco/#header-mega)

mega_menu_additional_submenu.label: Links
mega_menu_additional_submenu.info: Will be displayed under the categories (desktop only).

burger_additional_links.label: Additional links
burger_additional_links.info: Will be displayed at the bottom

mega_menu_with_cards_trigger.label: Trigger
mega_menu_with_cards_trigger.info: Write the exact name of the menu link. For more information, visit [the documentation page.](https://apparentcollective.com/help-center/documentation/san-francisco/#header-mega-with-cards)

follow.name: Follow
follow.info: The dropdown is only displayed on desktop devices

heading.default: This is Where Your Socials Go — Use a Clear Heading to Introduce the Section

info.label: Info
info.default: Use this space to encourage users to follow your brand for exclusive updates.

position.label: Position
position.info: For the "Notification bar" layout, the recommended positions are "Top" or "Bottom".

trigger-open-delay.label: Time delay for a trigger open

trigger-close-delay.label: Time delay for a trigger close

close-scroll-position.label: Close scroll position
close-scroll-position.info: It is recommended that the value be greater than the "Open scroll position".

manual-selector.label: CSS selector for manual trigger
manual-selector.info: If the html element has buttons or links inside, then clicking on them will not work.

overlay-close.label: Click overlay to close
overlay-close.info: Checking this will cause popup to close when user clicks on overlay

esc-close.label: Press ESC to close
esc-close.info: Checking this will cause popup to close when user presses ESC key

f4-close.label: Press F4 to close
f4-close.info: Checking this will cause popup to close when user presses F4 key

heading.label: Heading
heading.default: Use this space to enter your popup title

description.label: Description
description.default: Use this space to highlight a special promotion, newsletter sign-up incentive, or time-limited deal to capture attention.

heading.label: Heading
heading.default: Use this space to display an important message

text_declined.default: Access has been denied due to age restrictions.

empty_order_heading.default: You Haven't Placed Any Orders Yet

text.default: Add your addresses for next orders.

mobile_slider_aspect_ratio.label: Mobile aspect ratio
mobile_slider_aspect_ratio.info: When "Adapt to image" option is selected, the aspect ratio applies to the highest image in the blocks.

desktop_slider_aspect_ratio.label: Desktop aspect ratio
desktop_slider_aspect_ratio.info: When "Adapt to image" option is selected, the aspect ratio applies to the highest image in the blocks.

featured_text.content: Applies only if at least one "Featured post" block is added.

read_article_button_label.label: "Read article" button label
read_article_button_label.info: Leave empty to use default label.

featured_info_1.content: The featured post will be shown in the slider above the post list.

featured_info_2.content: To have different featured posts for each blog, it's recommended to create separate templates for each one.

paragraph.content: To change collection descriptions or collection images, [edit your collections.](/admin/collections)

color_scheme.label: Color scheme
color_scheme.info: The selected color scheme will apply if the collection has an image and the "Show collection image" setting is turned on.

image_products.label: Image for "Products" page
image_products.info: Image for automatically generated page with all products.

add_all_products.label: Add the "All products" tab at the start.

enable_filtering.label: Enable filtering
enable_filtering.info: Customize filters with the Search and Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)

enable_tags.label: Enable filtering
enable_tags.info: Customize filters with the Search and Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)

alt_desc.label: Alternative description
alt_desc.info: It is recommended to add metafield "description" with type "Single line text" for collection in Shopify admin. [About metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields)

text.label: Overwrite description
text.info: Leave the field blank to display the standard description.

show_excerpt.label: Show excerpt
show_excerpt.info: Will be displayed above description. To display this feature, create a metafield definition in "Store settings → Custom data → Product metafield definitions" with the namespace "custom.excerpt" and the type set to "Single line text" or "Multi-line text".

limited_stock.label: Limited stock
limited_stock.info: Marker stock as limited on amount and lower.

swatch_type.label: Swatch type
swatch_type.info: Applies only to the "Pills" type for Color swatches, which are configured in Theme Settings → Color swatch.

paragraph__1.content: Will be displayed if the product is not added to the cart.

info_1.content: This block is displayed if the "Buy buttons" block is enabled on the product page.

info_2.content: The main product will be added to the cart along with the selected additional service when clicking the Add to cart button in the "Buy buttons" block.

info_3.content: If the "Show dynamic checkout buttons" setting is enabled in the "Buy buttons" block, dynamic buttons will be disabled when additional services are selected.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

characteristics.label: Assign product characteristics
characteristics.info: If this setting is selected, the title and description metafield namespace must be characteristics.name and characteristics.description, and only "Heading" setting below will be available for it

description.default: This section should contain relevant information that helps customers make an informed decision, whether it’s warranty details, material breakdowns, or installation instructions.

paragraph__1.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

paragraph__2.content: Products will be displayed if they are not yet added to the cart.

heading.default: Use this space to enter your newsletter title

newsletter_text.label: Additional text
newsletter_text.default: I agree to receive emails and accept the privacy policy.

paragraph.content: When customers subscribe to emails, customer accounts are created. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers)

page.label: Page
page.info: Note that adding a contact page will not display the contact form. The contact form is a separate section.

product_list.label: Products
product_list.info: The product list takes priority over the collection.

text_about_products.content: If no products or collection are selected, all products in the store will be available for the section.

text_about_dynamic.content: If there are more than 50 products in the store or selected collection, products will be dynamically loaded from the collection page. The "Product card" options settings will be unavailable and will follow the settings in the "Product grid" section on the collection page. Additionally, the "Products amount" setting cannot exceed the value set in the "Product grid" section on the collection page.

button_link.info: If empty, the link will be auto-generated based on the selected sorting mode.

sort.label: Sort products by:
sort.info: "Featured" and "Best selling" do not work when products are selected using the "Products" setting.

text.default: Use this space to provide details about what’s being featured in this section, whether it’s a new launch, a trending product, or an exclusive deal.

header_overlay.info: Only for the first section on the page when "Overlay" layout and "Full width" settings are enabled. A color scheme with a dark background is recommended for slides.

aspect_ratio.label: Aspect ratio
aspect_ratio.info: When "Adapt to media" option is selected, the aspect ratio applies to the highest media in the blocks.

description.default: Use this space to provide details about what’s being featured in this slide, whether it’s a new launch, a trending product, or an exclusive deal.

header_overlay.info: Only for the first section on the page. A color scheme with a dark background is recommended for section.

text_images.content: The aspect ratio applies to the entire section, not to individual images.

heading.default: This is where your message goes

description.default: Use this space to give context to the image or video, explaining what it represents and why it matters.

column_width.label: Column width
column_width.info: Applies to desktop only if the slider on desktop is disabled.

add_separator.label: Add space separator
add_separator.info: Increases the space between the image and description.

heading.default: This is where your title goes

description.default: Use this space to describe the purpose of this block, such as showcasing craftsmanship, product benefits, or an exclusive offer.

placeholder.label: Placeholder
placeholder.info: Displayed if no image is selected.

overlay_opacity.info: Will be applied to the both parts.

heading.default: This is where your comparison goes
Highlight collections you want customers to explore

title.label: Title
title.info: If not set, collection name will be used.

image_2.info: Applicable only for the "With two images" layout type. Will be displayed only on desktop.

paragraph__3.content: For autoplay to work, the minimum number of slides must be equal to "Slides per view" setting.

main_text.label: Main text
main_text.default: Follow us on social media @link

description.default: This section enhances the browsing experience by providing an interactive way for visitors to explore different sections of your store or website through visually engaging tabs.

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: A small square image that will be displayed in a part of the content.

icon_dark.label: Dark mode icon
icon_dark.info: If not selected, the image from the "Icon" setting will always be displayed.

text.default: Use this space to provide context for the image tab, helping visitors understand its relevance.

description.default: This section enhances the browsing experience by providing an interactive way for visitors to explore different sections of your store or website through visually engaging tabs.

text.default: Use this space to expand on product specifications, including exact measurements, included accessories, or specific usage recommendations.

heading.default: This is where your brand’s story goes

text.default: Use this space to highlight key steps about your brand, such as its mission, values, or significant milestones.

text_info.content: It is recommended to fill each step with enough content to approximately match the screen height on desktop devices.

step_heading.label: Step heading
step_heading.default: Here can be a stage of the process

step_description.label: Step description
step_description.default: This section can showcase current achievements, sustainability efforts, or the future direction of the brand.

content_heading.label: Content heading
content_heading.default: Here can be a more descriptive title summarizing this phase

content_description.label: Content description
content_description.default: Use this space to provide a deeper explanation of what happened at this stage, including key decisions, challenges, and results.

enable_loop.info: 4 or more slides are recommended for correct functionality.

aspect_ratio.info: Aspect ratio works when animation is disabled

header_overlay.info: Only for the first section on the page. A color scheme with a dark background or dark background image is recommended.

background_video.label: Background video
background_video.info: It will overwrite the "Background image" setting.

secondary_image.label: Secondary image
secondary_image.info: A small image that will be displayed in the center of the section. It will be animated if the "Enable animation" setting is enabled.

secondary_video.label: Secondary video
secondary_video.info: A small video that will be displayed in the center of the section. It will be animated if the "Enable animation" setting is enabled. This video will overwrite the "Secondary image" setting.

header__heading__2.info: Will be displayed only if the "Enable animation" setting is enabled.

section_heading.default: Add a powerful message right here

section_heading_2.default: Use this space to introduce your brand, tell your story, or highlight a featured product collection.
